name: Disable-SettingsSync
commandPattern: New-Item -Path 'HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\SettingSync\Groups\Windows' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\SettingSync\Groups\Windows' -Name 'Enabled' -Type DWord -Value 0; New-Item -Path 'HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\SettingSync\Groups\Accessibility' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\SettingSync\Groups\Accessibility' -Name 'Enabled' -Type DWord -Value 0
